src.utils.hidden_prints
=======================

.. py:module:: src.utils.hidden_prints


Classes
-------

.. autoapisummary::

   src.utils.hidden_prints.HiddenPrints


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:class:: HiddenPrints

   A class for a context manager to suppress stdout output.


   .. py:method:: __enter__()

      Suppresses stdout output.



   .. py:method:: __exit__(exc_type, exc_val, exc_tb)

      Restores stdout output.
